column3: Racing in, Rizzo barely got to it but knocked it into foul territory, under the tarpaulins there.  Ott scored when May threw Rizzo's return over Warren.  After much discussion and arguing, a ground-rule double was eventually decided.FILENAME_TX"

$Mel Ott's 400th home run; he is the first NL player to reach this milestone and the fourth overall (Ruth, Gehrig, Foxx)1941NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

$Whitehead's hit went over Dallessandro's head and probably would have been a triple if it didn't end the game1941NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"

$On Jurges' bouncer, pitcher Lee threw high to 2B for an  error, and Moore was safe at second and Jurges at first. Moore overslid and was tagged out, Sturgeon to Cavaretta to Sturgeon, with Ott scoring from third.1941NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
$Etten left on stretcher1941NY1.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
